meanings.sent1: The antirabies vaccine protects pets from getting rabies.

meanings.definition: A substance used to prevent or treat rabies
meanings.sent1: The vet administered the antirabies injection to the injured dog.
meanings.sent2: The antirabies medicine is crucial in areas with high rabies cases.
